==== Notes ====
Since a move my breezy to dapper, the sleep & hibernate mode are very stange... they're working with ac and crash with battery mode. I don't know if the problem come from my migration (breezy to dapper) or to the new kernel.
When my computer crash during hibernate sequence, the cpu can't freeze.. 

* ''Yes, if the system has already crashed for some reason, then you will be unable to hibernate/suspend without a reboot first.  Please file a bug about the machine not hibernating properly:'' -PaulSladen
** https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/acpi-support/+filebug

Thanks, the bug is referer here: <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/acpi-support/+bug/34721|Bug34721]]</nowiki>
